cards.name: Paris, France
cards.description: The city of love where Rataoulie was filmed.

details.long_description: Paris is the capital of France and is known for being home to talented designers and cooks.
itenary: Day 1: Arrive in Paris and visit the Eiffel Tower.
Day 2: Discover the Louvre Musuem and stroll through the Champs-Elysees.
Day 3: Visit Goustau's, a five star restaurant, and walk along the Seine River.

cards.name: Barcelona, Spain
cards.description: It is the capital and largest city of the autonomous community of Catalonia.

details.long_description: It is the capital and largest city of the autonomous community of Catalonia, as well as the second-most populous municipality of Spain.
itenary: Day 1: Arrive in Barcelona and visit the Basilica de la Sagrada Familia.
Day 2: Follow the audio tour guide at Casa Batllo.
Day 3: Sunbathe and swim at La Barceloneta.

cards.name: Las Vegas, USA
cards.description: The city of sin. What happens in Vegas, stays in Vegas.

details.long_description: Las Vegas, colloquially referred to as Vegas, is the most populous city in the U.S. state of Nevada and the seat of Clark County
itenary: Day 1: Arrive in Vegas and visit the casinos.
Day 2: See one of the many shows offered at the Encore theater like Drag Race Live.
Day 3: Visit Netflix Bites, restaurant with themed drinks and food are served.
